title: Center collapsed chatroom header content on desktop

requirements.text: In desktop layouts (md breakpoint and up), update the collapsed state of the chatroom header in `frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx` so that the headerâ€™s inner content is centered horizontally when collapsed, matching the centered alignment used in the expanded state. Keep the existing mobile (small screen) collapsed layout behavior intact.

quotes: in desktop mode, the content in the collapsible container needs to be centered when in a collapsed state just like it is when its now collapsed. does that make sense? --- please confirm you understand. dont code yet

acceptanceCriteria: When the header is collapsed and the viewport is md or larger, the collapsed header content (topic + LIVE badge if present + counts + expand button) is visually centered horizontally within the header bar (not left-aligned with extra space to the right).
When the header is collapsed on small screens (below md), the current collapsed header layout and spacing behavior remain unchanged.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not modify any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change backend logic or data models.
Do not change what content appears in the header (only adjust alignment/centering in collapsed desktop layout).
